name: High Precision Editor
description: Changes the GD editor logic to save certain values at full precision

full-precision-object-position.name: Full Precision Object Position
full-precision-object-position.description: Overrides the default saving logic for object positions and save at full precision instead of 1 decimal place

full-precision-object-rotation.name: Full Precision Object Rotation
full-precision-object-rotation.description: Overrides the default saving logic for object rotations and save at full precision instead of truncating; also applies to warp transforms

full-precision-object-scale.name: Full Precision Object Scale
full-precision-object-scale.description: Overrides the default saving logic for object scale and save at full precision instead of truncating; applies to both X and Y scales

full-precision-trigger-parameters.name: Full Precision Trigger Parameters
full-precision-trigger-parameters.description: Overrides the default saving logic for trigger parameters and save at full precision instead of truncating; applies to most triggers

allow-decimal-move-parameters.name: Allow Decimal Move Parameters
allow-decimal-move-parameters.description: Allows you to enter decimals into the X and Y move amounts in move triggers and camera offset triggers, which is fully functional despite being impossible in an unmodded game

enable-slider-inputs.name: Enable Slider Inputs
enable-slider-inputs.description: Adds text inputs to some trigger properties, like the opacity of color and alpha triggers

misc-editor-fixes.name: Miscellaneous Editor Fixes
misc-editor-fixes.description: Fixes some bugs with the editor relating to numeric precision - not required for the rest of the mod, but recommended

misc-ui-fixes.name: Miscellaneous UI Fixes
misc-ui-fixes.description: Fixes a few very small issues and inconsistencies with the editor UI - visual changes only, not required for functionality
